apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji on Apple devices showcases two women, with one having a medium-dark skin tone and the other a medium skin tone, leaning in for a tender kiss, their lips nearly touching. Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting create a warm, intimate feel, highlighting the soft curves of their faces and the gentle glow. It’s a beautiful representation of love and affection between two women, often used to express partnership, romance, or heartfelt connection within Apple’s diverse emoji set.
